thread.section_title: The Roger - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great value.
thread.title_full: Great value. - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: karencJ5614LR
title: Great value.
text: The location is great and lobby inviting. Staff are wonderful and very service oriented. Main area of room is spacious but bathrooms are tiny (in case this is important to you). Gym is weirdly located through the restaurant and has limited equipment but still a bonus for the price. We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend for what you pay. Thanks to the staff for their great hospitality.
